title: Cocoa harvest
brief_description: The film shows the method of harvesting cocoa in the Gold Coast region of West Africa, including scenes of village life, sacks of beans on their way to the depot for grading and weighing, and finally transport by train and truck to the coast to be loaded on to ocean going steamers for export.
